page.title: 05COMMUNITY CENTRE,HIGHWORTH
page.content: The Community Centre of Highworth was opened in 1982 and is three years old.It is a pratten hut which used to be in a school in Swindon.It opens at all sorts of times,mainly providing youth clubs for various age groups, and bingo and day centre facilities for the elderly.Sometimes the groups using the centre organize trips out at weekends.It was started because there was nowhere in Highworth for the youth and elderly to go.There is table tennis,pool,darts and a computer available to those using the centre. One salaried person works full time. That is Sue Telling,the youth and community worker.
